text:
Mollie | Amsterdam, Netherlands | Full-time | Onsite

Mollie is an Amsterdam based fintech company. We create clever payment products for great companies of all sizes (we currently have 41.000+ clients). We have several engineering departments working on various products (merchant dashboard, marketing website, our payment APIs, and more).

More information: https://www.mollie.com/en/

View our current job openings: https://jobs.mollie.com

Contact me directly: vernon@mollie.com
